I've been really enjoying Dead by Daylight recently. It starts off as a horror game and then once you get your feet wet you get to bully killers. What I like the best about the game, is it's not so much about your mechanical skill, but more so about your decision making skills. Mechanical skill isn't completely missing from the game, but you can play a simple killer / survivor and still do well just off of game sense alone.

The DLC system kind of blows, I'm not gonna lie. If you want to play a meta killer build you'll either need to get really lucky with what's in the shrines and get good perks with the free currency, buy killers with good perks with free currency, or dish out that sweet sweet money to get all the best perks.
This problem doesn't really exist for survivors. A lot of the best perks for the most part are base game survivor perks. So, that's great. That's how it should be if you asked me.

Does the game have flaws, yeah quite a few. Some more glaring than others. Is the game generally enjoyable? Definitely.

jogo incrível, mais difícil pros sobreviventes quando se está aprendendo do que pro assassino, poderia ser mais fácil conseguir recursos para poder comprar mais personagens e poder variar a gameplay pelo fato de o jogo já ser pago, você paga pelo jogo e ainda tem que pagar mais e mais pra cada personagem que você queira jogar se não tiver tempo (muito tempo) pra jogar sempre.

Dead By Daylight is an amazing game!

What makes this game so interesting is that you'd never know what to expect from being the killer, or a survivor being hunted.  So you'll never have the same experience twice in a Dead By Daylight game.  The Dev's of this game are very helpful in case something goes wrong.  That game also has a cross-play feature, meaning you can connect and play with other platforms like Playstation, Xbox, and a Nintendo Switch (Yes Steam is included!).  Just keep in mind that this game does contain jump-scares and a lot of blood.  Otherwise you will enjoy this game.

10/10 прожжённых сидальников и дисконектов
Как бы ты не хотел отречься от этого кровавого разврата, ты продолжаешь возвращаться сюда, будто наркоман, которому нужна новая доза боли и страданий. Как можно хотя бы раз в день не быть закемперенным в подвале или повиснуть на крюке и не остаться там до конца матча?
При игре за мана всё ещё радужней. Хочешь, будем лупить вокруг одной обоссанной хижины, а  потом огреем внезапной паллетой и покликаем фонарём? А может, хочешь всю игру бегать по болоту и искать четырёх Клодетт в их естественной среде обитания? Милости просим.
А ещё баги! Застрял в камне на горе? Не беда! Дядя маньяк всегда поможет тебе, огрев тесаком по хребту и насадив на свой металлический крюк. В игре исчезают текстуры и объекты? Зато теперь вы можете бегать сквозь стены и улетать во владения самой Сущности!
В общем, игру рекомендую, но не рекомендую. Всем счастливых побегов!

I've owned this game for a few years and played it very irregularly over that time. First you should know that Dead By Daylight is an asymmetrical game, this means it it intentionally imbalanced to favour one side. This is all well and good, on release this game was pretty ridiculous with real infinites. (By this I mean spots where you have to rely on human error to catch a survivor.) Also side note: (How the fuck did we catch survivors back then?) Anyways, as of now survivors are the power role which doesn't make much sense at all. This doesn't mean Killer is impossible to be successful with, just much, much harder. Survivor is pretty easy to play and a great place to learn the basics of gameplay. Killer is a lot more advanced typically and you can very easily lose the match because of one small time-wasting error, mostly apparent at high ranks. 


The developers are pretty clueless on QA and balance changes. For years the general consensus has been "Killer always getting nerfed and survivors getting buffed." Now this isn't entirely true but holds some truth. On release survivors were MASSIVELY stronger than Killer through hundreds of tiny reasons to list a few, Killer vault speeds were super slow which made some infinites and power usage speeds Trapper and Hag used to take much more time setting traps up which really add up to wasted time which survivors can spend on generators, which might I add don't take very long to finish all of them. Developers went as far as telling people to stop playing and play something else, which is a real low. However killer did have a few things going for them, such as Moris being instant. Where a killer would not require a hook to allow the instant kill. Now all of these things have been changed for the better, but the game isn't in a great place still and I don't think it ever will be due to the nature of the game, and unreliable devs. 

The community of Dead by Daylight is one of the single worst in video games. And it really sucks, the game is super addicting and dare I say fun despite it's flaws. Plenty of toxicity and general hatred towards anyone who has a different opinion. This review might fall victim to this too, since I am being brutally honest about this and the devs really pander to the toxicity. I've seen survivor mains with 4k+ hours who insist the game becomes a killer bully simulator so they can boost their inflated ego. It's a great shame since they are a vocal majority and usually are pretty entitled. Don't bother arguing with them since it is just like arguing with a 5 year old, toxic killer do also exist but aren't celebrated like survivors are. Dozens of "highlight/montage" youtube channels litter the site showing "INSANE PLAYS" at typical loops and pallets, where they put the pallet down on the killer at a jungle gym or shack. Where I have not seen a single case where its a killer main instead, but please prove me wrong. 

To conclude, I could talk much more about this game and what I think but I feel I need to keep this as short as I can. I do not recommend this game to anyone. I have played it not for a super long time but I feel I've seen everything the game has to offer, next is just mastery. I have also bough numerous DLC's which the devs keep releasing instead of fixing aspects of the game that are outdated or broken/mechanically broken. (Sounds) If you really like asymmetrical games and or horror games and iconic horror movie characters, then perhaps buy this game but at least on a sale. (Like right now as of typing this! :D) 

Thank you for reading this far if you did. If you have any questions or comments do comment and I will try to answer to best of my ability. :)
Great game may have a few bugs and bad design chose but over all it will give you a great experience and will be worth all of the grinding.
